content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Toda mi vida':

content.stimulus_en: I haven't (never) ________ met him.
They have been there (once) ________.
Have you (ever) ________ been to Asia?
Has he (ever) ________ played golf?
I have (never) ________ seen a whale.
She has (never) ________ eaten octopus.
Has he ever played the piano in public?
Have ever you been to the United States?
She has never eaten such a delicious cake.
They been have to the beach many times.
I have lived in this city all my life.
I never have seen a ghost.
The experience related to Nunca is '________'.
Before
The experience related to Dos veces is '________'.
Many times

Already
